document.discussion_title: Planning/designing a garden (1.2 acres) irrigation system by haroov
document.topic_text: Planning/designing a garden (1.2 acres) irrigation system Este proyecto está terminando en 6 días y tiene una oferta promedio de $250 USD . 1 Descripción del Proyecto The all area is around 7 acres, most of it with an olive grove, with a working irrigation system including computer and a fertilize container. We need help planning / designing the irrigation system for out 1.2 acre garden around the hose. We have landscape & plant plan (attached) and a sketch for the garden taps The product I need is a DWG file (and a PDF) with a complete plan for the garden irrigation system and a schedule of quantities

We need help planning / designing the irrigation system for out 1.2 acre garden around the hose. We have landscape & plant plan (attached) and a sketch for the garden taps The product I need is a DWG file (and a PDF) with a complete plan for the garden irrigation system and a schedule of quantities
